item.title: World Gold Trust 10-K
item.description: World Gold Trust, which is in the [6221] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 23, 2022 had 20905 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: gold - 738 instances gldm - 435 instances shares - 265 instances bullion - 253 instances trust - 213 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
